name: Site Vital Monitoring by DREAMHIVE
author: DREAMHIVE

sections.description:
The DH WordPress Monitoring plugin only checks if the WordPress site is not stopped every 10 minutes just by installing the plugin.

This plugin will get your WordPress home_url and administrator email address to save you trouble.

Since information is transmitted using the WP-Cron function, there is a possibility that it may be erroneously determined that the site is stopped in the case of a site with less access.

This plugin access to external service below url for vital data logging.
https://lab.dreamhive.co.jp/wp_monitoring/log

Our full privacy policy is here.
https://www.dreamhive.co.jp/privacypolicy

PRIVACY NOTICES
With the default configuration, this plugin, in itself, does not:

  • track users by stealth;
  • write any user personal data to the database;
  • use cookies.
sections.installation:
DH WordPress Monitoring plugin is available through the WordPress Plugins Directory, so you can download and install automatically from the Plugins menu on your WordPress admin page.

  1. Install from WordPress.org Plugins directory through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: • Since information is transmitted using the WP – Cron function, there is a possibility that it may be erroneously determined that the site is stopped in the case of a site with less access.
